name: Cthulhu Uber Alles Free
description:
Join Dieter and nine other characters, each with his own agenda, in a lovecraftian tale of horror and mystery- follow the plot of the one of ist eight branching endings. Whether ruins falls upon the world, the end is stalled for a time or you become the very think you tried to stop, there's only one certain thing: The stars are right, and dead Cthulhu lies sleeping... rousing to eldritch dreams.

Features:
* A unique casual adventure game experience.
* Vivid characters: worth dying for.
* Non-linear gameplay filled with crucial choices.
* 8 breathtaking game endings.
